RootTreeWriter & _hostProcessor

Detailed Description

Abstract base class of callback classes for the RootTreeWrite processor Abstract interface for a RootTreeWriter-engine. Implement an descendant of this class to add variables to the output tree of the RootTreeWriterProcessor. After that add the new engine to the list of writer engines in the RootTreeWriter processor

Definition at line 29 of file RootWriteEngine.hh.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

marlin::RootWriteEngine::RootWriteEngine ( RootTreeWriter *  host  )  [inline]

constructor

Parameters:
[in] host pointer to the RootTreeWriter processor the constructor of a derived class must pass this pointer to this base class e.g. 

    /// SomeeWriteEngine( RootTreeWriter* host ):RootWriteEngine(host),
    ///                                          _engineName("SomeWriteEngine")
    /// {}

Member Function Documentation

virtual void marlin::RootWriteEngine::fillVariables ( EVENT::LCEvent *  evt  )  [pure virtual]

Implement this to extract the variables which you want to fill into the ROOT tree from the event. Write the value of the variables you want to add to the tree to the member variables, which you registered to the ROOT tree. The RootTreeWriter will call TTree::Fill() for you.

Parameters:
evt the current event

Implemented in marlin::EventPropertiesWriteEngine, marlin::ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine, marlin::BifWriteEngine, marlin::CollectionParameterWriteEngine, marlin::DeepAnaWriteEngine, marlin::DriftChamberWriteEngine, marlin::EventParameterWriteEngine, marlin::HcalTrackLarsEngine, marlin::HitWriteEngine, marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine, marlin::MCParticleWriteEngine, marlin::ShowerShapeEngine, marlin::TBTrackWriteEngine, marlin::TrackFinderWriteEngine, and marlin::TriggerWriteEngine.

Returns the name of the engine to the RootTreeWriter processor.

virtual void marlin::RootWriteEngine::registerBranches ( TTree *   )  [pure virtual]

Implement to register local variables to the output tree

Parameters:
pointer to the ROOT tree, which the RootTreeWriter processor fills at the end of each event. Usually the implementation looks like 

    /// hostTree->Branch("variable",&_variable" ,"variable/F"  );
    ///

. But you can add any type of branch you like.

Implemented in marlin::EventPropertiesWriteEngine, marlin::ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine, marlin::BifWriteEngine, marlin::CollectionParameterWriteEngine, marlin::DeepAnaWriteEngine, marlin::DriftChamberWriteEngine, marlin::EventParameterWriteEngine, marlin::HcalTrackLarsEngine, marlin::HitWriteEngine, marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine, marlin::MCParticleWriteEngine, marlin::ShowerShapeEngine, marlin::TBTrackWriteEngine, marlin::TrackFinderWriteEngine, and marlin::TriggerWriteEngine.

virtual void marlin::RootWriteEngine::registerParameters (  )  [pure virtual]

Used to register steering parameters. Implement to register marlin steering file parameters. Use marlin syntax to register parameters for the calling RootTreeWriter processor.

use 

    /// _hostProc.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(...)
    /// _hostProc.relayRegister...()
    ///

instead of marlin processors 

register...()

methods

Implemented in marlin::EventPropertiesWriteEngine, marlin::ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine, marlin::BifWriteEngine, marlin::CollectionParameterWriteEngine, marlin::DeepAnaWriteEngine, marlin::DriftChamberWriteEngine, marlin::EventParameterWriteEngine, marlin::HcalTrackLarsEngine, marlin::HitWriteEngine, marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine, marlin::MCParticleWriteEngine, marlin::ShowerShapeEngine, marlin::TBTrackWriteEngine, marlin::TrackFinderWriteEngine, and marlin::TriggerWriteEngine.
